segments.text: I see the warm light from the window illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so serene, focused on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing silently behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware she is of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much for just cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches precariously on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but this feels unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so calm in contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they could enjoy the day without this danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a pity no one's noticing the hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real tragedy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, caught in a moment of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
